description:
Bananya looks around. What is this place??? It looks like the legendary Rainbow Bananya has used her powers to send him to the big round thing in the sky, just like he always dreamed of! And there he meets... Oh my nya!
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Bananya and the Big Round World, Nya
Bananya to Manmaru no Sekai Nya
ばなにゃとまんまるのせかい にゃ
